name: Makrwatch
long_description:
Makrwatch helps D2C companies scale user acquisition with YouTube creators. Our clients see us as an alternative growth channel to Google/Facebook, by reaching their audience at a more efficient cost per acquisition and obtaining high quality customers that are more engaged. 

Makrwatch has been growing 100%+ year over year, currently processes 2M-5M in billings and helps creators in over 60+ countries. We are reaching 20 team members in 6+ countries, have been fully remote for the past years and aim to reach 20M in billings with 10,000 sponsored videos within the next 18 months.
one_liner: Scale new user acquisition with YouTube Creators

name: Pursuit
long_description:
Revlo helps eSports streamers better connect, engage, and monetize their fan base. 

Today, thousands of gamers are becoming online celebrities as they stream their video games to over 100 million fans all over the world. Yet, the only method for popular streamers to interact with their fans while streaming is in a cluttered IRC chat room. Revlo allows streamers to reward their loyal fans with recognition, merchandise, and interaction opportunities. Naturally, fans engage more, driving up repeat viewership and conversion into paid subscription on a streamer's channel.
one_liner: Revlo helps broadcasters on Twitch engage and monetize their fan…

name: Beek
long_description:
Beek is the app where latinos listen to the best audio content in Spanish from their favorite creators (audiobooks, meditations, audio series, and original content).  Users pay a subscription to access all the content, and creators make money per minute listened. 

There will be an audio platform for the 480M native Spanish speakers and Beek is the team building it.
one_liner: Leading audio subscription platform for Spanish content and creators

name: Easol
all_locations: London, England, United Kingdom; Lisbon, Lisbon, Portugal; New York, NY, USA
long_description:
Easol is the all-in-one platform for managing your entire experience business, on your terms. Sell directly on your own website with smart booking, payment, and marketing tools that all work together, brilliantly.

We believe that with the right tools, anyone can turn their passion into an empire. So we made them – and brought them together to work in sync, all in one place.

We call it Experience Commerce. It's e-commerce specially designed for selling experiences and especially designed for experience creators.
one_liner: Shopify for experiences

name: Exly
long_description: Exly is an all-in-one business platform built for knowledge businesses, coaches, trainers and creators to launch, manage and market their products (courses, webinars, ecommunities, 1:1 consultations and workshops).
one_liner: One stop shop for creators to launch, manage & grow their knowledge…

name: Plotdrive
long_description: We're building the world's first AI that actually remembers your entire book - an intelligent writing companion that transforms how stories get finished. Our mission is to solve the #1 reason books die unfinished: writers losing track of their own stories across hundreds of pages. Founded by brothers who've pushed creative boundaries across poker, VR gaming, and interactive storytelling, we combine deep technical expertise with an obsessive focus on what writers actually need. Our CEO, a former world-class poker player, brings the same strategic depth that won millions to ensuring every writer can finally type "The End." We're a team of rebellious optimists who've already helped authors break through decade-long blocks and publish books they thought would never see the light of day. The printing press gave stories reach. We're giving them wings.
one_liner: AI that remembers your book & writes like you

name: Kaiten
all_locations: New York, NY, USA; Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel; Remote
long_description:
Kaiten is a discovery app that gives you access to culinary products and experiences from quality makers around the world. 
We are home to hundreds of makers from around the world including restaurants, chefs, farmers, vineyards and even knife makers and ceramicists. Find new ways to enjoy the culinary world every day. A special bottle of wine, soy sauce from a 100 year old brewery in Kyoto, working a day at a Michelin star restaurant - if amazing people make it and sell it, you'll find it on Kaiten.
one_liner: Find culinary products and experiences from great makers everywhere

name: Global Belly
long_description:
Global Belly is a platform that helps creators and content companies add shoppable products to their content and monetize their audience. We drive social commerce for partnering brands, by matching their products to relevant content. 
We take care of technology, analytics and operations so that content creators can easily 
 create and start selling unique physical and virtual offerings in a matter of minutes. Global Belly has launched 100+ influencers in the food space and shipped thousands of products nationwide. Global Belly's co-founders are Ankita Sharma and Madhuri Sharma (unrelated). Ankita has a Masters in Computer Science (Carnegie Mellon) and MBA (NYU Stern) and experience working at Apple and Bloomberg. Madhuri brings the culinary and content marketing skills to the team, with a B.S in Film & Television (Boston University), a Culinary Arts degree (Institute of Culinary Education) and experience at Grey Global Group and The Food Network.
one_liner: Marketplace enabling social commerce for brands and content creators.

name: Mini Exhibitions
one_liner: Virtual events for remote teams

name: Jitter
long_description:
Jitter is a fast and simple motion design tool on the web. We help designers create professional animations for communication content, videos, websites or apps easily, while collaborating with product & marketing teams.
It's like “Figma for motion design”.
one_liner: Fast and simple animation tool on the web 💫

name: TagMango
long_description: TagMango is building a SAAS tool to enable edutainment creators create monetisation channels by creating paid and scalable communities. Anyone who has a skill-set, talent and an engaged audience can build their community on TagMango and provide exclusive services, learnings and content.
one_liner: Monetisation tool for the Indian creator economy

name: Laylo
long_description:
Laylo powers drops for some of the world’s biggest creators and brands. The platform combines landing pages, messaging, link tracking, and more to empower musicians, artists, celebrities, creators and brands with the tools to drive more sales and streams around their most important moments.

We're fortunate to work with some of the top musicians, sports teams, media brands and creators to offer the leading Drop CRM.
one_liner: The Drop CRM

name: Trendpop
long_description:
Trendpop is the leading analytics and insights platform for short-form video marketing. We’re on a mission to help anyone go viral on social video platforms. We’re a deeply technical team that has taken a data-first approach to this problem: our core engine has collected over a billion social video posts that are analyzed with state-of-the-art algorithms to understand the recommendation algorithms that power virality. 

Trendpop was co-founded by Yoav Zimmerman (CEO) and Jonathan (Yoni) Ben-tzur (CTO) in August 2020, raising money from YCombinator (W21) to build Trendpop and growing to profitability in 12 short months. In January 2022, Trendpop was acquired by Collab, a veteran company in the digital creator space and an official TikTok creative and marketing partner. Today, Trendpop powers the TikTok marketing programs of top major record labels in North America and is quickly expanding to new markets in the film, television, beauty, and DTC eCommerce industry. Trendpop is currently used by leading marketing and A&R professionals in the music industry (both indie and major) to help their artists go viral on TikTok and hundreds of brands and creators who consistently win on social video.
one_liner: Discover trends as they happen

name: Wabi
long_description: We are Shopify for the $15B creator economy in LATAM starting with online coaching businesses. For example, a fitness coach can use our no-code builder to get a branded landing page integrated with payments and a website that can host their online coaching programs and subscriber-only content.
one_liner: We are Shopify for the $15B creator economy in LATAM

name: Flowbo
all_locations: Los Angeles, CA, USA; Seoul, Seoul, South Korea
long_description:
Flowbo provides financing to online revenue-generating companies including creators and eCommerce. 

We package assets into investable products so creators can raise money. For example, we package receivables into factoring products.
one_liner: Pipe for online businesses

name: Revery AI
long_description:
We are building the TikTok for fashion — a platform for creators to showcase their works, gain traction and build their brands. 

### Reverie is powered by two pieces of core technology:
- An AI-enhanced design tool for creators to turn their design ideas into e-commerce quality product images very efficiently.
- An AI-powered Virtual Dressing Room to create professional fashion photography directly from product images. Both fashion creators and other users can easily style outfits on different models.

With our core tech, we are building an active community of fashion creators (designers, stylists, influencers, bloggers, artists, casting directors, etc..) who produce original designs and engaging content around the published pieces. The social media platform will provide a streamlined path for fashion creators to experiment with their ideas and build traction. 

We want to eventually become the default choice for anyone who wants to launch their fashion label, and have the future Off-White, Balenciaga, Rick Oven, etc. originate from Reverie. Our team combines deep expertise in technology (AI Phds) and the fashion industry (Community builder). Our Virtual Dressing room is live with top retailers (such as Neiman Marcus) and has ~1M ARR. We are backed by YCombinator, TSVC, Cabra VC, and other amazing angels with retail experience and connections. Join us to reshape the fashion industry!
one_liner: Tiktok for fashion - where designers show their work + build traction

name: Dots 💸
long_description: Dots is a developer-friendly API that lets businesses pay their contractors through just a few lines of code. Whether its gig workers like Uber drivers, sellers on marketplaces like Etsy, or simply your local handyman - Dots’ abstracts away the complexity of payouts completely. We manage the entire process: information collection (KYC), payments through any rail (ACH, Venmo, CashApp, Zelle, international, and many more to come), and even filing tax forms! Dots lets developers get payouts up and running over just a few hours, rather than the many months this would normally take.
one_liner: Developer friendly drop in payouts infrastructure

name: UpBanx
long_description:
UpBanx is Brex for D2C brands and content creators in Indonesia. We help our customers open a high-yield business account, get financing, manage transactions, and launch Web3 projects, all in one place. There are over 700k D2C brands and content creators in Indonesia. If we serve all of them, that is a $14b/year market opportunity.

We've raised $5.6m so far from investors like Y Combinator, Alpha JWC, Alto Partners, CreditEase, Oliver Jung and lndonesia's biggest influencer Raffi Ahmad who has over 100m followers on social. We have also raised from 6 other Y Combinator founders. We are open to working with more investors that can bring strategic value to our long-term roadmap.
one_liner: Brex for D2C Brands and Content Creators in Indonesia

name: Venue.ink
long_description: Venue.ink is a booking app for tattoo artists and studios. Receive bookings, manage your calendar, chat with clients and get paid. We help artists spend more time on art, and less time on admin.
one_liner: Software for tattoo artists and studios

name: Poko
long_description: Poko enables seamless transfers from local payment rails to web3 infrastructure enabling web3 wallets, marketplaces, games and DApps to acquire more users. With Poko’s SDK, web3 builders can easily enable fiat-to-crypto onramping with 100+ common local payment methods or easily pay for NFTs with local payment methods. Poko's fiat-to-cryptoonramp aggregator reduces onramping costs by up to 70% and increases transaction success rates by up to 5x through a smart routing logic and a single integration to multiple onramps. It's Direct Checkout solution enables one step purchasing from fiat payment rails from any smart contract for 79% higher user conversion. The co-founders’ experience includes being chief strategy officer of a $2.4B coincap protocol, leading technical implementation of Singapore’s central bank’s experiment in cross-border payments on blockchain rails, policy experience as payments task force member at the World Economic Forum, ex-Ethereum Foundation Fellow, and CTO of a 2M+ user play to earn game.
one_liner: Seamless Fiat Payments for Web3

name: Finnix
long_description: Finnix is a financial technology solutions provider for Indonesian creative businesses. We provide loans and financial management tools for event organizers, agencies, concert promoters, and others.
one_liner: Financial technology solutions for Indonesian creative businesses

name: Jamble
all_locations: San Francisco, CA, USA; Paris, Île-de-France, France
long_description: Jamble is the new place to buy & sell secondhand fashion. We empower resellers with video & Live streaming tools to sell more effectively; and buyers with a unique compelling experience. Jamble is designed for the sustainable fashion community to engage, connect and inspire. We’re a mobile-first platform and launched on iOS! 👉 Check us out: https://apple.co/3Pfwran
one_liner: Fashion resale marketplace powered by live streaming and video

name: Taro
long_description:
Taro members get access to insider advice on how to get promoted at their company, detailed data on compensation, and invitations to exclusive networking events.

Taro focuses on the non-coding parts of the job, with courses + Q&A from leads at top tech companies, organized by level + company. The result is faster career growth for software engineers: improved onboarding, promotion, and pay increases.

Sample topics include how to optimize performance review, effective code review, and faster onboarding. These are the skills essential for career growth that don't get taught in schools or bootcamps.
one_liner: On-demand career courses for software engineers

name: Pair AI
long_description: Pair AI is Shopify for knowledge products. We empower creators, educators, and experts to launch addicting mobile-first video courses and provide AI-assisted coaching services at scale. Our platform is a one-stop shop to seamlessly monetize what you know! We make learning as fun and engaging as watching a TikTok.
one_liner: Reimagining education with short form video and AI

name: Storyboarder
long_description:
Storyboarder is a tool and a platform for anyone to create, share, and sell webcomics.


In East Asia, the webcomic (or digital manga) industry is an $12B market and rapidly growing to the rest of the world. Webtoon, the largest company in the space, generates $100M / month in revenue. However, their addressable market is limited by their content creators, who need know how to draw. Readers are desperate for a greater variety of stories in webcomics.


Through years of working with filmmakers, we’ve built extremely easy to use storyboarding software  that has 700K users. We’re democratizing visual storytelling to everyone. We’re working on the next generation that, through advances in video game interfaces, ubiquitous 3D compute, and AI, will allow anyone to easily create scenes, pose characters, to create webcomics. 


Storyboarder is backed by Y Combinator (W23), David Karp (Tumblr Founder), Andrew Kortina (Venmo Founder), and other product focused investors.
one_liner: Tool and platform to create and sell webcomics

name: Lemon Slice
long_description: Lemon Slice (formerly Infinity AI) is a video foundation model for human motion and emotion. We allow creators to generate expressive, talking characters across all styles, from photorealistic to cartoons.
one_liner: Expressive characters that talk

name: Magic Hour
long_description:
Magic Hour is a professional video creation tool. 

It takes the best AI video models, puts them in one workflow, and makes creating an amazing video as easy as selecting a template and customizing it.

You can use the product at https://magichour.ai
one_liner: Platform for AI video generation.

name: awen
long_description:
Instead of navigating complex menus or learning new tools, creatives can simply describe their vision in natural language—“Draw me a Swiss mountain lake. Now make it sunset. Add a boat. Now animate it.”

Awen leverages AI reasoning to understand creative intent through voice. Our goal is to redefine how creatives engage with AI technology, balancing power and ease of use for both professionals and newcomers.
one_liner: We are rebuilding photoshop with an AI-voice interface.

name: Beluga Labs
long_description:
The rapidly growing creator economy ($250B+) consists of millions of solo entrepreneurs still managing complex business finances with spreadsheets and a patchwork of disconnected tools. They face volatile multi-source income, unique business expenses, and daunting U.S. tax obligations: leading to significant stress, lost time, and missed financial opportunities.

Beluga Labs is building the financial operating system for these modern solopreneurs. Our platform starts with intelligent bookkeeping: we connect all their financial accounts, use AI to automatically categorize income and expenses, and assess their potential tax deductibility, giving creators a clear picture of their business finances and tax preparedness. This core solution, already actively used for expense management and tax Q&A, is the first step. We will rapidly expand to automate quarterly tax filing and payments, then provide integrated tools for S-corp formation and management, payroll, and benefits: truly becoming the 'Rippling for content creators.' Our success means creators save more money, reduce administrative burdens, and can confidently focus on their craft and growth within the creator economy.
one_liner: Rippling for Content Creators

name: Reacher
long_description:
Reacher automates affiliate marketing for enterprise brands, replacing teams of 5+ people with AI-powered creator discovery, outreach, and management. 

Trusted by brands driving $20M+ in GMV, we're building the largest marketplace where creators access premium deals guided by an AI talent manager, while brands access our vetted network of top creators.
one_liner: We help brands scale creator partnerships 10x faster
